title: Trade networks' effect on econ and politics

content.description: Use the map below to answer all parts of the question that follows.
content.question:
Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B.

Briefly explain TWO effects on European economies during the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries of the trade networks shown on the map.

Briefly explain ONE effect on European politics during the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries of the trade networks shown on the map.

frqParts.text:

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
